findings.details: Added automatic iframe title fallback and playsinline for videos to improve mobile UX and accessibility.
Network restricted; external link availability not verified. Manual scan found no placeholder or http:// links in templates/pages/posts.
SEO tags and structured data remain consistent; no regressions detected.
Set media preload defaults to metadata to reduce bandwidth on initial load.

recommendations: Keep verifying external links when network access is available
Review embedded media titles for semantic accuracy on key pages
